subject: Appropriate Assert Funcs?
msgSnippet: I am still new trying to design a test case whereby my class file can read this xml file and come out with the necessary results / scenario. Sorry, but I am
messageBody:
I am still new trying to design a test case whereby my class file can
read this xml file and come out with the necessary results / scenario.

Sorry, but I am still new to JUnit.

Say that if I have this xml file code:

<section-manage>
<display section_id="acquisition" order="ASC" sort_column="2" />
<display section_id="serials" order="DESC" sort_column="4" />
</section-manage>

The conditions are:

1. If display section is incorrect or null, the entire node is ignored.
2. If the order is incorrect it will revert to the default value ASC.
3. If sort_column is lower than 1 or more than 10, it will revert the
default value to 1.

I am not sure whether I got it right, but I do know that I have to use
the Assert method - in my own test class file, but with some help and
advice, i hope to come out with a better test class.

Thanks
